Wall Shaker

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 302
spell [itemspell]: #998 Panic
siege bonus [siegebonus]: +25
national discount [nationrebate]: #28 EA Hinnom - Sons of the Fallen

Requires 15A to forge (A3)

This horn is designed to tear down castle walls. When blown before a castle wall, that wall will shake and eventually crumble to dust. The Wall Shaker is thus a great help during sieges. The horn can also be blown during combat and will cause panic in the enemy ranks.
